## Checklist
- [ ] I have checked that my code runs correctly on the latest version of Minecraft targeted by this plugin (1.21.11).
- [ ] I am submitting code that I either have written myself OR retain the right to re-license AND have followed the correct procedures (if applicable: attribution, license inclusion, etc.) to use said code with permission.
